import React from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import useFetchProducts from '../Fetch/Product'; // Import the custom hook function ProductList(products) { return (
{products.map((product) => (
{product.pname}
${product.price}
{product.pstock && (
{product.pstock}
)}
Add To Cart
Buy Now
))}
); } export default ProductList;
